COVID INFORMATION

We expanded the already existing protective measures so that all treatments can take place within the necessary safety framework.

We do not have a standard waiting room but separate waiting islands. Thus, safety distance and discretion are still maintained.

  • Direction

    Car & Parking

    3 minutes from parking garage Talgarten (Kaufleuten,
    Nüschelerstrasse 31)
    5 minutes from parking garage Jelmoli (Steinmühleplatz 1)
    7 minutes from parking garage Urania (Uraniastrasse 3)

    Public transport

    3 minutes from Paradeplatz (tram 2/6/7/8/11/13/17)
    3 minutes from Rennweg (tram 6/7/11/13/17)
